messages.content: Almost everyone I know in Edinburgh North & Leith has found life tough over the last year or so.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are proposing a tax plan launched by Nick Clegg and Vince Cable which would put an extra £700 back into the pockets of most families, cut income tax from income lower than £10,000, and ensure the very rich pay a bit more in taxes through measures such as closing tax loopholes and introducing a mansion tax on homes valued over £2 million.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet mentions the last general election result to suggest strategic voting considerations.

issues.economy: Liberal Democrats will provide real help by putting extra money back into the pockets of families.

housing.content: By closing tax loopholes and introducing a mansion tax on homes valued over £2 million, ordinary people can be given a tax cut.

leaflet.personalStatement: Together we can get real change and get real help for local families here in Edinburgh North & Leith.
